alibi_pt1.name: Stretch
alibi_pt1.line: We fancied some fresh fish, so we came down to the wharves...

alibi_pt1.name: Stretch
alibi_pt1.line: We where here to beat the snot outta Jimmy...

alibi_pt1.name: Stretch
alibi_pt1.line: We where looking for somewhere dry, outta the rain...

alibi_pt2.name: Skids
alibi_pt2.line: ...we heard gunshots, and ran in here to help...

alibi_pt2.name: Skids
alibi_pt2.line: ...we heard gunshots, and ran in here for cover...

alibi_pt2.name: Skids
alibi_pt2.line: ...it was dark, we fumbled with our guns... and they went off...

alibi_pt3.name: Stretch
alibi_pt3.line: ...Jimmy was dead when we got here!
